Knowledge Network
  • Calling knowledge bases
  • View page source

Calling knowledge basesÔÉÅ

Knowledge bases can talk to each other. You call another knowledge base by invoking its reply method.

response = other_knowledgebase.reply(chat_history, caller=self.identifier)
